comments_data.body:
Confused.

According to the error stack, it seems that TiKV has `panic`ed with unexpected `None` after skipping all `test` codes:
https://github.com/tikv/tikv/blob/fa6e1753c2c4916ae5918281db3d863ec47ce322/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/peer.rs#L6414-L6420
Thx for the help from @SpadeA-Tang , this bug is introduced by the incorrect compilation settings in the `hybrid-engine` crate.
